name: Summoned by a Magic Goddess
summary:
From a nobody to a hero, this is your new life in a fantasy realm!

After a sudden accident you are thrown into a fantasy world filled with elves, dwarves, and other magical creatures! Magic is everywhere, but for some reason you are stuck fighting the old fashioned way. Hardly very heroic, but you quickly find yourself in a team of beautiful girls that definitely make you feel much better!

Defend your group from monsters as you make your way across the vast land, and maybe discover a spark of romantic magic…

Can you fulfill your destiny and become a hero, or will you fall to the power of the gods?
